title: Diploma in Psychology of Everyday Life
headline: Learn about everyday behavior, normal-abnormal dilemma, and the issues confronting society from this free online course.
description: This free online course, Diploma in Psychology of Everyday Life will guide you through the strategies of managing various psychological issues in today's society. Learn about the dilemma of determining expected and abnormal human behavior, and the mental health issues confronting children, adolescents, and adults in society. Start this course today and improve your knowledge of psychology and psychiatry.
courseDescription:
Diploma in Psychology of Everyday Life is a free online course that will enable you to gain insight into the behavioral and mental issues confronting society. This course will guide you through the mental health challenges and dilemmas in the world of psychology and other related fields. You will begin the course with a discussion on psychology, psychiatry, forms of aggression, and the effects of behavioral reinforcement.

Then, you will examine the normal-abnormal dilemma in classifying behavior from various perspectives. You will also study different mental health illnesses affecting young adults in society, and the major issues from the National Mental Health Survey such as depression, anxiety disorders, and personality disorders. Finally, you will learn about developmental behavior and mental health problems in children including IQ assessments, learning disabilities, autism, and impairments.

This free online course will help you explore the plethora of mental health issues prevalent in society and the strategies for managing them. This course will be of special interest to students, care providers, parents, teachers, and health professionals concerned with improving the mental well-being of the society. Sign up for this course today and improve your knowledge of psychology and psychiatry.
